Body:
input_df = pd.DataFrame({'home_team': ['a', 'a', 'a'], 'offense_team': ['a',
    'b', 'a']})
expected_input_df = input_df.copy()
expected_transformed_df = pd.DataFrame({'home_team': ['a', 'a', 'a'],
    'offense_team': ['a', 'b', 'a'], 'offense_home_team': [True, False, True]})
ciow = preprocessing.ComputeIfOffenseIsHome('offense_team', 'home_team',
    offense_home_team_colname='offense_home_team', copy=True)
transformed_df = ciow.transform(input_df)
pd.util.testing.assert_frame_equal(input_df.sort_index(axis=1),
    expected_input_df.sort_index(axis=1))
pd.util.testing.assert_frame_equal(transformed_df.sort_index(axis=1),
    expected_transformed_df.sort_index(axis=1))
